General.Name: Jiugui Liquor Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiugui Liquor Co., Ltd. produces and sells liquor products in China. It offers fragrant flavored craft liquors and cultural wines. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Jishou, China.
General.Address: Zhenwuying Jiuguijiu Industrial Park, Jishou, China, 416000
